body:
Job Description:

The position is located in Bucharest, Romania.

Ceragon training department provides up to date training material and tools for entire organization.
Ceragon trainer also involves in practical trainings around the globe, providing the highest level of training for Ceragon customers, partners and employees.
In order to maintain the highest level of knowledge, Ceragon trainers are working closely with Expert’s team and R&D.

By joining our team, you will enrich your experience and become a proficient trainer in the telecommunications field, working closely with high-end technologies and have global interaction with hi-tech professionals.

Job Requirements:

The ideal candidate has the following:

Must:

•	1st degree (BA/BSc) in technology related field 
•	3 Years of proven experience as trainer for technology companies (customer facing) 
•	Proven excellent English communication, both verbal and written
•	Ability to create high level presentations (PowerPoint) 
•	Available for international travel throughout the world (estimated to 50% from working time) 

Advantage: 

•	Additional common languages (Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, French) 
•	Experience in wireless communication, and specifically Microwave 
•	IP and networking knowledge 
•	Experience with e-learning software (Adobe Captive, Camtasia, Wink) 
We are looking for candidates with excellent communication skills, capable of self-learning and working in a challenging environment, who is highly motivated and able to work under pressure, as well as willing to work as a team player.
title: Support Training Engineer
locations: 5 Gheorghe Manu Street Floor 2 and 4 District 1, București, Municipiul București, România
